281.sentence: seemed like a good deal , but this pos frequently cannot recognize dvds and music cds -- takes a long time loading and then concludes , " no disc " .

282.sentence: granted , i have only used this dvd player for about 2 hours setting it up for my mom for christmas , but that was long enough for me to find problems with this dvd player .

283.sentence: first , the player did not allow me to access the menus of dvds .

285.sentence: the remote is flimsy-feeling and awkward to use .

286.sentence: in addition , it only seems to work if you 're about five feet away from the player , although that may have been just the batteries that came with it .

287.sentence: the player does seem to play dvds adequately enough .

288.sentence: after less than 24 hours it turned out to be a huge disappointment , for myself and for my parents , for whom it was a gift .

289.sentence: it played only one out of three dvd 's without problems , the other two being afflicted by a number of glitches .

290.sentence: both of the problem dvd 's would repeatedly freeze during playback , while the counter on the player kept going .

291.sentence: one also exhibited extremely slow speed when going to the menu .

292.sentence: the dvd door would scratch the top of the disc every time it closed .

293.sentence: there were a few attractive features , such as the small size and the layout of the remote .

294.sentence: all in all , trying to save some money on this player resulted in me shelling a great deal more when i purchased a much nicer dvd vcr combo player to make up for blazing crappiness of this very embarassing gift .

295.sentence: i was impressed by this very inexpensive player.for the first three hours , and then it died .

296.sentence: i looked into buying an inexpensive dvd player that had more than the standard set of features and this item seemed to be the best in that category .

297.sentence: i just hooked it up and everything seemed to be going fine .

298.sentence: there are a couple of quirks that were a bit annoying like having to actually press the power button before the tray will open ( my prev. machine did it automatically ) , and the fact that the external display is too small and too faded to read from any significant distance .

299.sentence: still , i was willing to overlook those things as this unit looks sleek and has a myriad of features !

300.sentence: i get to chapter 34 and everything freezes !

301.sentence: i try navigating to a chapter past 34 via the menu and it would n't do it !

302.sentence: i try navigating using the player 's built in menu , and it still would n't work !

303.sentence: unfortunately , the player would not read any of my region one dvds. even though they were not damaged in any way .

304.sentence: i called apex 's support number numerous times but it just kept ringing .

305.sentence: this is probably one of the few dvd players at $ 40 that can play almost everything you throw at it .

306.sentence: ability to play most discs - i tried dvd , vcd , dvd-r , audio cd and it played all

308.sentence: the build quality shows why its so cheap - small scratches on the base plate , something that you would n't see on a sony and an overall plasticky feel

309.sentence: remote buttons are small and closely spaced , especially with the menu buttons .

310.sentence: this is wonderful to have for your first dvd player .

311.sentence: i brought it for my sister in college and she loves it !

312.sentence: apex is the best cheap quality brand for dvd players .

314.sentence: the one i purchased for a frend as a gift will not read any dvd disc .

315.sentence: it will read and play all cd audio disc .
